column4: hey i just want to report what i think is a bug, but i'm not sure and i don't really do development, can i tell someone here?  it has to do with the xulrunner package
have you reported it to launchpad? give lots of details, i used version, to do action and result happened
i guess i'm not really familiar with that

https://launchpad.net/ is the bug tracking system used for ubuntu, try and find the application name and see if anyone has submitted a bug report for it, if it's a new issue include as much info as you can so it is easier to track down the bug
